subject: Sleep
title: Medication Effects on Stages
description: A quick win: understand Medication Effects on Stages.

hook.text: Sleeping pills help you fall asleep. But what they deliver is often a distorted version of natural sleep.

buildup.text: Most sedative-hypnotics increase N2 sleep and decrease both deep sleep and REM sleep.

discovery.text: Benzodiazepines suppress deep sleep significantly. Z-drugs are better but still alter natural architecture.

twist.text: People taking sleep meds often report better sleep subjectively, even when their brain scans show worse structure.

climax.text: The medication creates amnesia for awakenings, making sleep seem better than it actually was.

punchline.text: Some pills don't improve sleep. They just erase the memory of bad sleep.

quiz.question: How do most sleeping pills affect sleep architecture?
options: They increase N2 but suppress deep sleep and REM
